events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized under Refund due to the customer's request to return the incorrect item.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the incorrect item received.
Hello! Sorry to hear about the mix-up with your order. Iâ€™m here to help with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund?
Thank you. My order number is 123456789, and I have attached a photo showing the item I received is not what I ordered.
We have verified the issue and will initiate a full refund to your payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thank you for your quick response and resolving this matter efficiently. I appreciate the support.
Your refund has been successfully processed, and you should see the amount credited back shortly.
Just following up to ensure you have received your refund and everything has been resolved to your satisfaction.
Since the refund was received and no further issues reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
